name: Monstrous Peryton
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can\'t speak

traits.Flyby: The peryton doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
traits.Keen Sight and Smell: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.
traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If the peryton fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
